rules_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor_text: [i]“Though I may wander, I will always return. You are all the friends I've met. You are all the lessons I've learned. You are my home, so when I say ‘goodbye,' hear also ‘for now.'”[/i]
